content:
Hey everyone,

there has been some discussion about creating a searchable archive of helpdesk questions (e.g. in #zulip-bridged > Helpdesk archival). I've now implemented what has been discussed there and set up a new stream #helpdesk (archived) which is publicly archived on https://juliacommunity.github.io/zulip-archive/ (for now, nicer domain will follow).

This does not affect #helpdesk in any way.

If you have a question that others may benefit from, consider posting it in #helpdesk (archived) from now on :)

I've you've had Zulip open for a while (longer than ~12 hours) and can't see or join the stream due to an error, try reloading Zulip. If that doesn't fix it, DM me and I can re-add you.

There's an issue where the stream won't be listed and clicking on the link will show an error that it's private which may be related to Zulip not updating its status properly.

(Thanks Simon Schoelly for reporting it)
